verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> that<WH834> came<WH1961> to<WH413> Jeremiah<WH3414> concerning<WH5921> <WH1697> the dearth.<WH1226>
Judah <WH3063> mourneth,<WH56> and the gates<WH8179> thereof languish;<WH535> they are black<WH6937> unto the ground;<WH776> and the cry<WH6682> of Jerusalem<WH3389> is gone up.<WH5927>

And their nobles<WH117> have sent<WH7971> their little ones<WH6810> to the waters:<WH4325> they came<WH935> to<WH5921> the pits,<WH1356> and found<WH4672> no<WH3808> water;<WH4325> they returned<WH7725> with their vessels<WH3627> empty;<WH7387> they were ashamed<WH954> and confounded,<WH3637> and covered<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>

Because <WH5668> the ground<WH127> is chapped,<WH2865> for<WH3588> there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> rain<WH1653> in the earth,<WH776> the plowmen<WH406> were ashamed,<WH954> they covered<WH2645> their heads.<WH7218>
Yea, <WH1571> the hind<WH365> also calved<WH3205> in the field,<WH7704> and forsook<WH5800> it, because<WH3588> there was<WH1961> no<WH3808> grass.<WH1877>

And the wild asses<WH6501> did stand<WH5975> in<WH5921> the high places,<WH8205> they snuffed up<WH7602> the wind<WH7307> like dragons;<WH8577> their eyes<WH5869> did fail,<WH3615> because<WH3588> there was no<WH369> grass.<WH6212>

O LORD,<WH3068> though<WH518> our iniquities<WH5771> testify<WH6030> against us, do<WH6213> thou it for thy name's sake:<WH4616> <WH8034> for<WH3588> our backslidings<WH4878> are many;<WH7231> we have sinned<WH2398> against thee.

O the hope<WH4723> of Israel,<WH3478> the savior<WH3467> thereof in time<WH6256> of trouble,<WH6869> why<WH4100> shouldest thou be<WH1961> as a stranger<WH1616> in the land,<WH776> and as a wayfaring man<WH732> that turneth aside<WH5186> to tarry<WH3885> for a night?

Why <WH4100> shouldest thou be<WH1961> as a man<WH376> astonished,<WH1724> as a mighty man<WH1368> that cannot<WH3201> <WH3808> save?<WH3467> yet thou,<WH859> O LORD,<WH3068> art in the midst<WH7130> of us, and we are called<WH7121> by thy name;<WH8034> leave<WH5117> us not.<WH408>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> unto this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> Thus<WH3651> have they loved<WH157> to wander,<WH5128> they have not<WH3808> refrained<WH2820> their feet,<WH7272> therefore the LORD<WH3068> doth not<WH3808> accept<WH7521> them; he will now<WH6258> remember<WH2142> their iniquity,<WH5771> and visit<WH6485> their sins.<WH2403>
Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> me, Pray<WH6419> not<WH408> for<WH1157> this<WH2088> people<WH5971> for their good.<WH2896>

When <WH3588> they fast,<WH6684> I will not<WH369> hear<WH8085> <WH413> their cry;<WH7440> and when<WH3588> they offer<WH5927> burnt offering<WH5930> and an oblation,<WH4503> I will not<WH369> accept<WH7521> them: but<WH3588> I<WH595> will consume<WH3615> them by the sword,<WH2719> and by the famine,<WH7458> and by the pestilence.<WH1698>

Then said<WH559> I, Ah,<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD!<WH3069> behold,<WH2009> the prophets<WH5030> say<WH559> unto them, Ye shall not<WH3808> see<WH7200> the sword,<WH2719> neither<WH3808> shall ye have<WH1961> famine;<WH7458> but<WH3588> I will give<WH5414> you assured<WH571> peace<WH7965> in this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>

Then the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto<WH413> me, The prophets<WH5030> prophesy<WH5012> lies<WH8267> in my name:<WH8034> I sent<WH7971> them not,<WH3808> neither<WH3808> have I commanded<WH6680> them, neither<WH3808> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> them: they<WH1992> prophesy<WH5012> unto you a false<WH8267> vision<WH2377> and divination,<WH7081> and a thing of naught,<WH434> and the deceit<WH8649> of their heart.<WH3820>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> concerning<WH5921> the prophets<WH5030> that prophesy<WH5012> in my name,<WH8034> and I<WH589> sent<WH7971> them not,<WH3808> yet they<WH1992> say,<WH559> Sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall not<WH3808> be<WH1961> in this<WH2063> land;<WH776> By sword<WH2719> and famine<WH7458> shall those<WH1992> prophets<WH5030> be consumed.<WH8552>

And the people<WH5971> to whom<WH834> they<WH1992> prophesy<WH5012> shall be<WH1961> cast out<WH7993> in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the famine<WH7458> and the sword;<WH2719> and they shall have none<WH369> to bury<WH6912> them,<WH1992> them,<WH1992> their wives,<WH802> nor their sons,<WH1121> nor their daughters:<WH1323> for I will pour<WH8210> <WH853> their wickedness<WH7451> upon<WH5921> them.

Therefore thou shalt say<WH559> <WH853> this<WH2088> word<WH1697> unto<WH413> them; Let mine eyes<WH5869> run down<WH3381> with tears<WH1832> night<WH3915> and day,<WH3119> and let them not<WH408> cease:<WH1820> for<WH3588> the virgin<WH1330> daughter<WH1323> of my people<WH5971> is broken<WH7665> with a great<WH1419> breach,<WH7667> with a very<WH3966> grievous<WH2470> blow.<WH4347>

If <WH518> I go forth<WH3318> into the field,<WH7704> then behold<WH2009> the slain<WH2491> with the sword!<WH2719> and if<WH518> I enter<WH935> into the city,<WH5892> then behold<WH2009> them that are sick<WH8463> with famine!<WH7458> yea,<WH3588> both<WH1571> the prophet<WH5030> and<WH1571> the priest<WH3548> go about<WH5503> into<WH413> a land<WH776> that they know<WH3045> not.<WH3808>

Hast thou utterly rejected<WH3988> <WH3988> <WH853> Judah?<WH3063> hath thy soul<WH5315> loathed<WH1602> Zion?<WH6726> why<WH4069> hast thou smitten<WH5221> us, and there is no<WH369> healing<WH4832> for us? we looked<WH6960> for peace,<WH7965> and there is no<WH369> good;<WH2896> and for the time<WH6256> of healing,<WH4832> and behold<WH2009> trouble!<WH1205>
We acknowledge,<WH3045> O LORD,<WH3068> our wickedness,<WH7562> and the iniquity<WH5771> of our fathers:<WH1> for<WH3588> we have sinned<WH2398> against thee.

Do not<WH408> abhor<WH5006> us, for thy name's sake,<WH4616> <WH8034> do not<WH408> disgrace<WH5034> the throne<WH3678> of thy glory:<WH3519> remember,<WH2142> break<WH6565> not<WH408> thy covenant<WH1285> with<WH854> us.

Are there<WH3426> any among the vanities<WH1892> of the Gentiles<WH1471> that can cause rain?<WH1652> or<WH518> can the heavens<WH8064> give<WH5414> showers?<WH7241> art not<WH3808> thou<WH859> he,<WH1931> O LORD<WH3068> our God?<WH430> therefore we will wait<WH6960> upon thee: for<WH3588> thou<WH859> hast made<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things.
